Text: How to install your games without jailbreak on ipod touch 4g 4.1? please reply if i can!!!

i think there is no way to install these (cracked) apps without jailbreak...u have to jailbreak your ipod...and i also think you should do it coz you can do much more than just pirate apps with your jailbroken ipod
i know but i'm scared that my ipod might get corrupted !!

it is very hard to brick the ipod or iphone...one way to brick it has something to do with editing system files...and of course the second way is to smash it with a brick...so if you won't try anything it should be ok...and if it isn't ok, one-click restore repairs everything..except broken display if you really smashed your ipod with a brick...
